S04bsu022_u:217: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāmaśvaratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthvīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantanto 'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati /
S04bsu022_u:218: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
S04bsu022_u:219: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
S04bsu022_u:220: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavanmaṇiratnamutpadyate śuddhanīlavaiḍūryamaṣṭāṃśaṃ suparikarmakṛtam /
S04bsu022_u:221: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayā sarvamantaḥpuramavabhāsyena sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:222: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaṃ [Vaidya_13] maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:223: atha rātryāmardharātrasamaye 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ taṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre ucchrāpayitvā udyānabhūmiṃ niryāti subhūmidarśanāya /
S04bsu022_u:224: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayāsarvāvantaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyamavabhāsena sphuṭībhavati sāmantena yojanam /
S04bsu022_u:225: ye khalu punastasya maṇiratnasya sāmantake manuṣyāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu022_u:228: anyonyamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭha bhadramukhāḥ karmāntāni kārayataḥ āpaṇāni prasārayata,
S04bsu022_u:230: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
S04bsu022_u:231: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
S04bsu022_u:233: sadṛśī kṣatriyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurī nātikṛṣṇā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā /
S04bsu022_u:236: śītalakāle cāsyā uṣṇasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi bhavanti, uṣṇakāle ca śītasaṃsparśāni /
S04bsu022_u:237: sā rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ muktvā nānyasmin manasāpi rāgaṃ karoti kiṃ punaḥ kāyena /
S04bsu022_u:238: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
S04bsu022_u:239: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
S04bsu022_u:240: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavad gṛhapatiratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī divyacakṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:241: sa tena divyacakṣuṣā sāmantena yojanaṃ sasvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati, asvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati /
S04bsu022_u:242: sa yāni tāni bhavanti asvāmikāni, tai rājñaścakravartino dhanena karaṇīyaṃ karoti /
S04bsu022_u:243: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
S04bsu022_u:244: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
S04bsu022_u:245: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhāṣibhiktasya pūrvavatpariṇāyakaratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
S04bsu022_u:247: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:249: bhavati cāsya putrasahasraṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:252: vāntachandarāgo netā ananyadevaḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti //
S04bsu022_u:253: tathā anye 'pi devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya pratyekabuddhebhya ārocayanti sma - riñcata mārṣā buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu022_u:255: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare golāṅgulaparivartane parvate mātaṅgo nāma pratyekabuddho viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:256: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kardama iva śilāyāṃ prasthāya vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya ca tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvāṇo 'yam /
S04bsu022_u:261: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena vārāṇasyāṃ ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:262: te 'pi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvānti sma /
S04bsu022_u:263: yatteṣāṃ pittaśleṣmamāṃsāsthisnāyurudhiraṃ cābhūt, tatsarvaṃ tejasā paryavadānamagacchat /
S04bsu022_u:266: abhayadattāśca tasmin mṛgāḥ prativasanti iti tadagreṇa mṛgadāvasya mṛgadāva iti saṃjñodapādi //
S04bsu022_u:267: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthitaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:268: katamāni catvāri? tadyathā - kālavilokitaṃ dvīpavilokitaṃ deśavilokitaṃ kulavilokitam //
S04bsu022_u:269: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kālavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
S04bsu022_u:270: na bodhisattva ādipravṛtte loke sattvasaṃvartanīkālasamaye mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati,
S04bsu022_u:271: atha tarhi yadā vyakto lokaḥ susthito bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:277: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo dvīpavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
S04bsu022_u:278: na bodhisattvā pratyantadvīpā upapadyante, na purvavidehe, nāparagodānīye, na cottarakurau /
S04bsu022_u:280: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvo deśavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
S04bsu022_u:282: yeṣu manuṣyā andhajātyā jaḍā eḍamūkajātīyā abhavyāḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāmarthaṃ jñātum /
S04bsu022_u:284: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kulavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
S04bsu022_u:285: na bodhisattvā hīnakuleṣūpapadyante caṇḍālakuleṣu vā veṇukārakule vā rathakārakule vā puṣkasakule vā /
S04bsu022_u:286: atha tarhi kuladvaye evopapadyante brāhmaṇakule kṣatriyakule ca /
S04bsu022_u:287: tatra yadā brāhmaṇaguruko loko bhavati, tadā brāhmaṇakule upapadyante /
S04bsu022_u:288: yadā kṣatriyaguruko loko bhavati, tadā kṣatriyakule upapadyante /
S04bsu022_u:291: tamarthaṃ ca saṃpratītya bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:293: iti hi bhikṣavaste devaputrāḥ bodhisattvasyānyonyaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - katamasmin kularatne kiyadrūpāyāṃ jananyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhateti /
S04bsu022_u:294: tatra kecidāhuḥ - idaṃ vaidehīkulaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:298_0: tathā hi - tanna [Vaidya_15] mātṛśuddhaṃ pitṛśuddhaṃ aplutaṃ cañcalamanavasthitaṃ
S04bsu022_u:300: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ punaḥ kauśalakulaṃ mahāvāhanaṃ ca mahāparivāraṃ ca mahādhanaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:303: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi - kauśalakulaṃ mātaṅgacyutyupapannaṃ na mātṛpitṛśuddham /
S04bsu022_u:304: hīnādhimuktikaṃ na ca kuloditaṃ na cāparimitadhanaratnanidhisamutthitam /
S04bsu022_u:306: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ vaṃśarājakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:310: tathāhi - vaṃśarājakulaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca caṇḍaṃ ca na cojjvalitatejasaṃ parapuruṣajanmāvṛtaṃ ca na mātṛpitṛsvatejaḥ karmābhinirvṛttaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:313_0: apare 'pyāhuḥ - iyaṃ vaiśālī mahānagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā
S04bsu022_u:320: ekaika eva manyate - ahaṃ rājā, ahaṃ rājeti /
S04bsu022_u:323: apare tvevamāhuḥ - idaṃ pradyotakulaṃ mahābalaṃ ca mahāvāhanaṃ ca paracamūśirasi vijayalabdhaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:326: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - te caṇḍāśca capalāśca raudrāśca paruṣāśca sāhasikāśca, na ca karmadarśinaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:328: apara evamāhuḥ - iyaṃ mathurā nagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca /
S04bsu022_u:332: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathāhi - sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭikulavaṃśaprasūto dasyurājā /
S04bsu022_u:333: na yujyate caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya mithyādṛṣṭikule upapattum /
S04bsu022_u:335_0: apare 'pyāhuḥ - ayaṃ hastināpure mahānagare rājā pāṇḍavakulavaṃśaprasūtaḥ śūro vīryavān
S04bsu022_u:338: tathā hi - pāṇḍavakulaprasūtaiḥ kulavaṃśo 'tivyākulīkṛto [Vaidya_16] yudhiṣṭhiro dharmasya putra iti kathayati,
S04bsu022_u:343: apara āhuḥ - iyaṃ mithilā nagarī atīva ramaṇīyā maithilasya rājñaḥ sumitrasya nivāsabhūmiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:350: evaṃ bhikṣavaste bodhisattvā devaputrāśca sarvasmin jambudvīpe ṣoḍaśajānapadeṣu yāni kāniciduccoccāni rājakulāni,
S04bsu022_u:353: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāṃ jñānaketudhvajo nāma devaputro 'vaivartiko bodhāya kṛtaniścayo 'sminmahāyāne /
S04bsu022_u:354: sa tāṃ mahatīṃ bodhisattvadevaparṣadametadavocat - etanmārṣā etameva bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya pariprakṣyāmaḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne kule caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti /
S04bsu022_u:355: sādhviti te sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paryaprākṣuḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne satpuruṣakularatne caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti //
S04bsu022_u:356: tato bodhisattvastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ devagaṇaṃ ca vyavalokya etadavocat - catuṣṣaṣṭyākārairmārṣāḥ saṃpannakulaṃ bhavati yatra caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyate /
S04bsu022_u:373: amātyāvekṣitaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
S04bsu022_u:374: avandhyaśilpaniveśanaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
S04bsu022_u:377: kṛtajñaṃ ca kṛtaveditaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:418: anavadyaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati sarvajātivādadoṣaiḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
S04bsu022_u:419: ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati yasmiṃścaramaḥ bhaviko bodhisattva utpadyate //
S04bsu022_u:420: dvātriṃśatā mārṣā guṇākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī bhavati yasyāḥ striyāścaramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:421: katamairdvātriṃśatā? yaduta abhijñātāyāṃ striyāṃ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:422_0: abhilakṣitāyā acchidropacārāyā jātisaṃpannāyāḥ kulasaṃpannāyā rūpasaṃpannāyā nāmasaṃpannāyā
S04bsu022_u:422_2: pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇyā vyaktāyā vinītāyā viśāradāyā bahuśrutāyāḥ paṇḍitāyā aśaṭhāyā amāyāvinyā
S04bsu022_u:422_3: akrodhanāyā apagaterṣyāyā amatsarāyā acañcalāyā acapalāyā amukharāyāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyasaṃpannāyā
S04bsu022_u:423: ebhirmārṣā dvātriṃśatākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī yasyāḥ striyāḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati //
S04bsu022_u:424: na khalu punarmārṣāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati, api tu śuklapakṣe /
S04bsu022_u:425: evaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ puṣyanakṣatrayoge poṣadhaparigṛhītāyā mātuḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati //
S04bsu022_u:426: atha khalu te bodhisattvāste ca devaputrā bodhisattvasyāntikādimāmevarūpāṃ kulapariśuddhiṃ mātṛpariśuddhiṃ ca śrutvā cintāmanaskārā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:427: katamaṃ kulaṃ evaṃguṇasamanvāgataṃ bhavedyāvadvidhamanena satpuruṣeṇa nirdiṣṭam?
S04bsu022_u:428: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāmetadabhūt - idaṃ khalvapi śākyakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:430_0: sarvaśākyaviṣaye caikarājā pūjito mānitaḥ śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyapāriṣadyānāṃ prāsādiko
S04bsu022_u:430_1: darśanīyo nātivṛddho nātitaruṇo 'bhirūpaḥ sarvaguṇopetaḥ śilpajñaḥ kālajña ātmajño
S04bsu022_u:430_2: dharmajñastattvajño lokajño lakṣaṇajño dharmarājo dharmeṇānuśāstā avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:432_0: rājñaśca śuddhodanasya māyā nāma devī suprabuddhasya śākyādhipaterduhitā navataruṇī
S04bsu022_u:432_1: rūpayauvanasaṃpannā aprasūtā apagataputraduhitṛkā surūpā salekhyavicitreva darśanīyā

S04bsu022_u:432_6: smitamukhī pūrvābhilāpinī ślakṣṇamadhuravacanā pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇī ṛjvī akuṭilā aśaṭhā
S04bsu022_u:432_7: amāyāvinī hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā acapalā acañcalā amukharā avikīrṇavacanā mandarāgadveṣamohā
S04bsu022_u:432_10: yaṣṭiḥ suvinītā suvibhaktāṅgapratyaṅgā aninditāṅgī bimboṣṭhī cārudaśanā anupūrvagrīvā
S04bsu022_u:432_11: svalaṃkṛtā sumanā vārṣikī suviśuddhadarśanā suvinītāṃsā anupūrvasujātabāhuścāpodarī
S04bsu022_u:432_15: māyānirmitamiva bimbaṃ māyānāmasaṃketā kalāvicakṣaṇā nandana ivāpsaraḥ - prakāśā
S04bsu022_u:434: yā ceyaṃ kulapariśuddhirbodhisattvenodāhṛtā, sā śākyakula eva saṃdṛśyate //
S04bsu022_u:436: Lal_3.1 prāsādi dharmoccayi śuddhasattvaḥ sudharmasiṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:438: Lal_3.2 tatropaviṣṭāna abhūṣi cintā katamatkulaṃ śuddhasusaṃprajānam /
S04bsu022_u:440: yadbodhisattve pratirūpajanme mātā pitā kutra ca śuddhabhāvāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:441: Lal_3.3 vyavalokayantaḥ khalu jambusāhvayaṃ yaḥ kṣatriyo rājakulo mahātmā /
S04bsu022_u:442: sarvān sadoṣānanucintayantaḥ śākyaṃ kulaṃ cādṛśu vītadoṣam //
S04bsu022_u:443: Lal_3.4 śuddhodano rājakule kulīno narendravaṃśe suviśuddhagātraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:444: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca nirākulaṃ ca sagauravaṃ sajjanadhārmikaṃ ca //
S04bsu022_u:445: Lal_3.5 anye 'pi sattvāḥ kapilāhvaye pure sarve suśuddhāśaya dharmayuktāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:447: Lal_3.6 sarve mahānagna balairupetā vistīrṇahastī navaratnavanti /
S04bsu022_u:448: iṣvastraśikṣāsu ca pāramiṃ gatā na cāparaṃ hiṃsiṣu jīvitārtham //
S04bsu022_u:449: Lal_3.7 śuddhodanasya pramadā pradhānā nārīsahasreṣu hi sāgraprāptā /
S04bsu022_u:450: manoramā māyakṛteva bimbaṃ nāmena sā ucyati māyādevī //
S04bsu022_u:451: Lal_3.8 surūparūyā yatha devakanyā suvibhaktagātrā śubhanirmalāṅgī /
S04bsu022_u:452: na so 'sti devo na ca mānuṣo vā yo māya dṛṣṭvātha labheta tṛptim //
S04bsu022_u:453: Lal_3.9 na rāgaraktā na ca doṣaduṣṭā ślakṣṇā mṛdū sā ṛjusnigdhavākyā /
S04bsu022_u:455: akarkaśā cāparuṣā ca saumyā smitīmukhā sā bhrukuṭīprahīṇā //
S04bsu022_u:456: Lal_3.10 hrīmā vyapatrāpiṇī dharmacāriṇī nirmāṇa astabdha acañcalā ca /
S04bsu022_u:458: Lal_3.11 karmekṣiṇī mithyaprayogahīnā satye sthitā kāyamanaḥsusaṃvṛtā /
S04bsu022_u:459: strīdoṣajālaṃ bhuvi yatprabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tato 'syāḥ khalu naiva vidyate //
S04bsu022_u:460: Lal_3.12 na vidyate kanya manuṣyaloke gandharvaloke 'tha ca devaloke /
S04bsu022_u:461: māyāya devīya samā kuto 'ntarī pratirūpa sā vai jananī maharṣeḥ //
S04bsu022_u:462: Lal_3.13 jātīśatāṃ pañcamanūnakāri sā bodhisattvasya babhūva mātā /
S04bsu022_u:463: pitā ca śuddhodanu tatra tatra pratirūpa tasmājjananī guṇānvitā //
S04bsu022_u:464: Lal_3.14 vratastha sā tiṣṭhati tāpasīva vratānucārī sahadharmacāriṇī /
S04bsu022_u:465: rājñābhyanujñāta varapralabdhā dvātriṃśa māsāmava kāma sevahi //
S04bsu022_u:466: Lal_3.15 yatra pradeśe sthihate niṣīdate śayyāgatā ca kramaṇaṃ ca tasyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:467: obhāsito bhoti sadevabhāgo ābhāya tasyāḥ śubhakarmaniṣṭhayā //

S04bsu022_u:1010: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste 'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti /

S04bsu022_u:1012: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti //
S04bsu022_u:1013: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1015: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe)
S04bsu022_u:1018: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
S04bsu022_u:1019: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1022: yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1024: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1025: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
S04bsu022_u:1026_0: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā
S04bsu022_u:1026_1: brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1028: bhagavānāha - kva sa idānīṃ brahman? upadarśaya tam /
S04bsu022_u:1030: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
S04bsu022_u:1032: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1033: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt //

S04bsu022_u:1038_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1038_1: bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:1039: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum /
S04bsu022_u:1040: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1041: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre)
S04bsu022_u:1042: sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā śīrṣavyavalokanenānuvilokayati sma unmeṣadhyāyikayā vā /
S04bsu022_u:1048: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1049: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
S04bsu022_u:1050: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:1051: sa tānavocat - kimahaṃ mārṣāḥ kariṣyāmi? ahamapi na labhe draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:1052: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1053: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:1054: śakra āha - āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1056: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1057: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1061: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1062: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā /
S04bsu022_u:1063: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
S04bsu022_u:1065: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1066: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
S04bsu022_u:1069: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā [Vaidya_49] bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:1071: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1072: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
S04bsu022_u:1074: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1075: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1076: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1077: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya /
S04bsu022_u:1078: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
S04bsu022_u:1079: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1080: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1081: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma //
S04bsu022_u:1082: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1083: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1084: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
S04bsu022_u:1085: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1086: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1087: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1088: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt /
S04bsu022_u:1089: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma?
S04bsu022_u:1090: dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:1092: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam /
S04bsu022_u:1093: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1094: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
S04bsu022_u:1095: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena //
S04bsu022_u:1096: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu022_u:1097: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt /
S04bsu022_u:1098: [Vaidya_50] na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1099: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
S04bsu022_u:1100: tadyathāpi nāma kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśo nidarśanamātreṇa, na tu tasyopamā saṃvidyate /
S04bsu022_u:1101_0: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1101_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya
S04bsu022_u:1105: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1106: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
S04bsu022_u:1107: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu022_u:1108_0: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca
S04bsu022_u:1108_1: mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1108_2: mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1109: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
S04bsu022_u:1110: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1111: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1113: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1115: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛtto 'bhūt prabhāsvaro 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1116: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo 'tīva śobhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1118: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:1119: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
S04bsu022_u:1120: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1124: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1126: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1127: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1129_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ
S04bsu022_u:1129_1: sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1130: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1132: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
S04bsu022_u:1134: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1135: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1138: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1139: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1140: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1141: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1142: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1145: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti /
S04bsu022_u:1146: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
S04bsu022_u:1147: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma, paścādbodhisattvamātā //
S04bsu022_u:1148: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1149: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu022_u:1151: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1153: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1154: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1155: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1156: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma, tanmukhā bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1157: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1158: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1161: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1162: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:1163: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1164: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1165: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1167: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1168: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:1169_0: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite
S04bsu022_u:1169_2: puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ
S04bsu022_u:1169_3: draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum /
S04bsu022_u:1170: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
S04bsu022_u:1171: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1173: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:1174: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:1175: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1176: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma, tanmukhaiva māyādevī bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1177: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:1179: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1180: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1182: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1184: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:1185: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1186: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1187_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo 'dhastādupariṣṭāt
S04bsu022_u:1187_1: santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya
S04bsu022_u:1188: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:1190: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:1191: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1192: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1194: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
S04bsu022_u:1196: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1197: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1198: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
S04bsu022_u:1199: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1200: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1201: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1202: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1203: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1205: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:1206: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1208: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:1210_0: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa
S04bsu022_u:1211: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1212: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1213: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1215: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
S04bsu022_u:1217: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:1218: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma //
S04bsu022_u:1219: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya) pranadanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1223: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1224: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:1225: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma, pibanti sma, (ramante sma,)
S04bsu022_u:1231: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo 'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma //
S04bsu022_u:1233: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:1234: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:1236: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:1237: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1238: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham //
S04bsu022_u:1239: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1241: Lal_6.23 bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
S04bsu022_u:1242: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate //
S04bsu022_u:1243: Lal_6.24 suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:1244: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito //
S04bsu022_u:1245: Lal_6.25 mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
S04bsu022_u:1246: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī //
S04bsu022_u:1247: Lal_6.26 na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe /
S04bsu022_u:1248: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1249: Lal_6.27 śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
S04bsu022_u:1250: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā //
S04bsu022_u:1256: Lal_6.29 ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:1257: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1258: Lal_6.30 vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
S04bsu022_u:1259: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā //
S04bsu022_u:1260: Lal_6.31 athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
S04bsu022_u:1261: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite //
S04bsu022_u:1262: Lal_6.32 yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu022_u:1263: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:1264: Lal_6.33 no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
S04bsu022_u:1265: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate //
S04bsu022_u:1266: Lal_6.34 aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
S04bsu022_u:1267: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram //
S04bsu022_u:1268: Lal_6.35 [Vaidya_56]ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:1269: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1270: Lal_6.36 rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
S04bsu022_u:1271: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:1272: Lal_6.37 so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
S04bsu022_u:1273: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati //
S04bsu022_u:1279: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:1280: katamāni dvātriṃśat? sarvapuṣpāṇi suṅgībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1281: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1282: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1284: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1287: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
S04bsu022_u:1289: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1290: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1291: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1292: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1293: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1294: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1295: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:1296: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:1298: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:1301: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:1303: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /

S04bsu022_u:2278: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam /
S04bsu022_u:2280: Lal_11.5 loke kleśāgnisaṃtapte prādurbhūto hyayaṃ hradaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2281: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati //
S04bsu022_u:2295: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2296: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2297: so 'vocat - kumāraḥ kva gataḥ? nainaṃ paśyāmīti /
S04bsu022_u:2299: tato 'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam /
S04bsu022_u:2300: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2301: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2302: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2303: Lal_11.10 paśya deva kumāro 'yaṃ jambucchāyāhi dhyāyati /
S04bsu022_u:2304: yathā śakro 'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate //
S04bsu022_u:2305: Lal_11.11 yasya vṛkṣasya chāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo varalakṣaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2306: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam //
S04bsu022_u:2307: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2310: Lal_11.12 hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2311: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam //
S04bsu022_u:2313: Lal_11.13 yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman /
S04bsu022_u:2314: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka //
S04bsu022_u:2315: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2316: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ - mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti /
S04bsu022_u:2318: Lal_11.14 vyāvṛtte timiranudasya maṇḍale 'pi vyomābhaṃ śubhavaralakṣaṇāgradhārim /
S04bsu022_u:2319: dhyāyantaṃ girinicalaṃ narendraputraṃ siddhārthaṃ na jahati saiva vṛkṣachāyā //
S04bsu022_u:2321: Lal_11.15 grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṃpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṃprakīrṇe /
S04bsu022_u:2323: Lal_11.16 [Vaidya_93]chando 'bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama locanārtham /
S04bsu022_u:2324: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṃgham //
S04bsu022_u:2325: Lal_11.17 madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2326: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so 'buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:2328: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṃskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti //
S04bsu022_u:2329: Lal_11.19 so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṃstaru saṃstaritvā /
S04bsu022_u:2330: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṃ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2331: Lal_11.20 pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum /
S04bsu022_u:2332: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto //
S04bsu022_u:2333: Lal_11.21 vaya meruparvatavaraṃ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2334: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṃ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha //
S04bsu022_u:2335: Lal_11.22 avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṃ tahi jambumūle /
S04bsu022_u:2336: jambunadārcisadṛśaṃ prabhatejaraśmiṃ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:2337: Lal_11.23 [Vaidya_94]te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu /
S04bsu022_u:2338: sādho sujāta sumukhaṃ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṃ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān //
S04bsu022_u:2339: Lal_11.24 parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṃ yatha padmapatram /
S04bsu022_u:2340: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya //
S04bsu022_u:2341: Lal_11.25 śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2342: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2343: Lal_11.26 śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
S04bsu022_u:2344: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:2345: Lal_11.27 so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
S04bsu022_u:2346: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam //
S04bsu022_u:2347: Lal_11.28 mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
S04bsu022_u:2348: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ //
S04bsu022_u:2349: Lal_11.29 paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
S04bsu022_u:2350: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena //
S04bsu022_u:2351: Lal_11.30 [Vaidya_95]so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2352: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa //
S04bsu022_u:2353: Lal_11.31 yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:2354: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra //
S04bsu022_u:2355: Lal_11.32 anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
S04bsu022_u:2356: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2362: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:2363: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt /
S04bsu022_u:2364: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:2366: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2368: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu022_u:2370: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:2376: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2378: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
S04bsu022_u:2380: rājā prāha - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ / tat prativedayiṣyāmastāvat kumārasya, katamā te kanyā rocata iti /
S04bsu022_u:2381: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2382: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti //
S04bsu022_u:2384: Lal_12.1 vidita mama ananta kāmadoṣāḥ saraṇasarvairasaśokaduḥkhamūlāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2386: Lal_12.2 kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
S04bsu022_u:2387: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2389: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:2390: Lal_12.3 saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām /
S04bsu022_u:2391: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti //
S04bsu022_u:2392: Lal_12.4 ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2393: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām //
S04bsu022_u:2394: Lal_12.5 na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
S04bsu022_u:2395: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā //
S04bsu022_u:2396: Lal_12.6 so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
S04bsu022_u:2397: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā //
S04bsu022_u:2398: Lal_12.7 yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
S04bsu022_u:2399: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta //
S04bsu022_u:2400: Lal_12.8 yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
S04bsu022_u:2401: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate 'pramattā //
S04bsu022_u:2402: Lal_12.9 na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
S04bsu022_u:2404: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā //
S04bsu022_u:2405: Lal_12.10 satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
S04bsu022_u:2406: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā //
S04bsu022_u:2407: Lal_12.11 na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
S04bsu022_u:2408: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema //
S04bsu022_u:2409: Lal_12.12 śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
S04bsu022_u:2410: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2411: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare /
S04bsu022_u:2413: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
S04bsu022_u:2414: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2417: Lal_12.13 brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:2418: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya //
S04bsu022_u:2419: Lal_12.14 na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2420: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2421: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma /
S04bsu022_u:2423: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2424_0: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā
S04bsu022_u:2424_1: śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ
S04bsu022_u:2426: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
S04bsu022_u:2428: Lal_12.15 śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ paramābhirūpo dvātriṃśalakṣaṇadharo guṇatejayuktaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2429: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī //
S04bsu022_u:2431: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:2432: Lal_12.16 mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2433: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:2434: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:2435: āha - kasyāsau? āha - daṇḍapāṇerdeva śākyasya duhitā //
S04bsu022_u:2436: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca /
S04bsu022_u:2439: tatra yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣurabhiniveśyati, tāṃ kumārasya varayiṣyāmīti //
S04bsu022_u:2440: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni /
S04bsu022_u:2441: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu022_u:2444: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu022_u:2445: rājāpi śuddhodano 'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma - yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
S04bsu022_u:2447: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum //
S04bsu022_u:2449: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo 'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:2450: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
S04bsu022_u:2451: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:2452: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2453: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:2456: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
S04bsu022_u:2457: āha - nāhaṃ tvāṃ vimānayāmi, api tu khalu punastvamabhipaścādāgateti /
S04bsu022_u:2459: sā prāha - idamahaṃ kumāra tavāntikādarhāmi? āha - imāni madīyānyābharaṇāni, gṛhyatām /
S04bsu022_u:2460: sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ? alaṃkariṣyāmo vayaṃ kumāram /
S04bsu022_u:2462: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:2465: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā,
S04bsu022_u:2468: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:2472: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:2473: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S04bsu022_u:2478: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /

S04bsu022_u:2680: Lal_12.27 iha gṛhagata yuṣme paśyathā sattvasāram api ca daśasu dikṣū gacchate 'yaṃ kṣaṇena /

S04bsu022_u:2698: atha te sarve harṣitā bhūtvā bodhisattvamabhinipatitāḥ /

S04bsu022_u:2718: sundaranandena ṣaṭkrośasthā bheryāhatābhūt, nottari śaknoti sma /
S04bsu022_u:2719: daṇḍapāṇinā dviyojanasthā bheryāhatābhūt, nirviddhā ca nottari śaknoti sma /
