S04bsu022_u:3880: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3881: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:3883: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:3884: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti //
S04bsu022_u:3887: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:3890: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti /
S04bsu022_u:3891: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:3892: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3893: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
S04bsu022_u:3896: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:3897: sacedvanavāsānurūpāṇi kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi labheyam, śobhanaṃ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:3899: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:3900: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:3905: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:3907: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:3911: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
S04bsu022_u:3912: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3916_1: pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme 'bhaye 'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase 'mṛte dharmadhātau
S04bsu022_u:3918: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:3920: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3933: kāścidvikṣiptakeśyaḥ, kāścitkeśaṃ viluñcantyaḥ, kāścidūrdhvabāhavaḥ uccairutkrośanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3934: kāścinmṛgya iva digdhaviddhāḥ sahasā pradhāvantyo [Vaidya_165] rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3935: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3937: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:3938: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:3939: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate?
S04bsu022_u:3940: śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:3945: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:3946: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti //
S04bsu022_u:3948: gacchata, yāvatkumāraṃ na paśyatha, tāvanmā nivartayatha //
S04bsu022_u:3950: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
S04bsu022_u:3952: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:3954: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:3958: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
S04bsu022_u:3960: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka,
S04bsu022_u:3961: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:3963: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
S04bsu022_u:3965: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham //
S04bsu022_u:3966: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam?
S04bsu022_u:3970: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:3975: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno 'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma /
S04bsu022_u:3976: tāni mahānārāyaṇasaṃghaṭanakāyārthamanye [Vaidya_166] nārāyaṇasaṃhananā na śaknuvanti sma dhārayitum /
S04bsu022_u:3977: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:3978: tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:3981: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:3984: Lal_15.102 niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
S04bsu022_u:3985: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante //
S04bsu022_u:3986: Lal_15.103 gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:3987: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:3988: Lal_15.104 rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
S04bsu022_u:3989: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:3990: Lal_15.105 gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
S04bsu022_u:3991: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:3992: Lal_15.106 rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
S04bsu022_u:3993: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā //
S04bsu022_u:3994: Lal_15.107 na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye /
S04bsu022_u:3995: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:3996: Lal_15.108 [Vaidya_167]udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3997: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena //
S04bsu022_u:3998: Lal_15.109 hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:3999: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā //
S04bsu022_u:4000: Lal_15.110 mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
S04bsu022_u:4001: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam //
S04bsu022_u:4002: Lal_15.111 so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4003: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi //
S04bsu022_u:4004: Lal_15.112 mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
S04bsu022_u:4005: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4006: Lal_15.113 chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
S04bsu022_u:4007: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:4008: Lal_15.114 mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4009: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante //
S04bsu022_u:4010: Lal_15.115 chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
S04bsu022_u:4012: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:4013: Lal_15.116 ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
S04bsu022_u:4014: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto //
S04bsu022_u:4015: Lal_15.117 gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
S04bsu022_u:4016: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā //
S04bsu022_u:4017: Lal_15.118 dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
S04bsu022_u:4018: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam //
S04bsu022_u:4019: Lal_15.119 sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4020: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4021: Lal_15.120 chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe /
S04bsu022_u:4022: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam //
S04bsu022_u:4023: Lal_15.121 so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
S04bsu022_u:4024: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam //
S04bsu022_u:4025: Lal_15.122 śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4026: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto //
S04bsu022_u:4027: Lal_15.123 [Vaidya_169]ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
S04bsu022_u:4028: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4029: Lal_15.124 chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
S04bsu022_u:4030: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā //
S04bsu022_u:4031: Lal_15.125 udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
S04bsu022_u:4032: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo //
S04bsu022_u:4033: Lal_15.126 sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
S04bsu022_u:4034: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā //
S04bsu022_u:4035: Lal_15.127 hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
S04bsu022_u:4036: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā //
S04bsu022_u:4037: Lal_15.128 hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
S04bsu022_u:4038: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā //
S04bsu022_u:4041: Lal_15.130 hā mama anantakīrte śatapuṇyasamudgatā vimalapuṇyadharā /
S04bsu022_u:4043: Lal_15.131 hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
S04bsu022_u:4044: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā //
S04bsu022_u:4045: Lal_15.132 hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
S04bsu022_u:4047: Lal_15.133 hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:4050: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā //
S04bsu022_u:4051: Lal_15.135 ha mahya gītavādyā varapuṣpavilepanā śubhaṛtupravare /
S04bsu022_u:4053: Lal_15.136 hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
S04bsu022_u:4054: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe //
S04bsu022_u:4055: Lal_15.137 gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
S04bsu022_u:4056: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4057: Lal_15.138 katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
S04bsu022_u:4058: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī //
S04bsu022_u:4059: Lal_15.139 atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
S04bsu022_u:4061: Lal_15.140 tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /
S04bsu022_u:4064: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā //
S04bsu022_u:4065: Lal_15.142 paripūryato 'sya āśā spṛśatū varabodhisamuttamāṃ drumavariṣṭhe /
S04bsu022_u:4066: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin //
S04bsu022_u:4067: Lal_15.143 chandakaḥ paramadīnamānaso gopikāya vacanaṃ śruṇitvanā /
S04bsu022_u:4068: sāśrukaṇṭha gira saṃprabhāṣate sādhu gopi niśṛṇohi me vacaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4069: Lal_15.144 rātriye rahasi yāmi madhyame sarvanārigaṇi saṃprasuptake /
S04bsu022_u:4070: so tadā ca śatapuṇyaudgato ālapeti mama dehi kaṇṭhakam //
S04bsu022_u:4071: Lal_15.145 taṃ niśāmya vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ tubhya prekṣami śayāni suptikām /
S04bsu022_u:4072: uccaghoṣu ahu tatra muñcamī utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo //
S04bsu022_u:4073: Lal_15.146 [Vaidya_171]devatā vacanu taṃ nirodhayi eka istri napi kāci budhyate /
S04bsu022_u:4075: Lal_15.147 kaṇṭhako hiṣati ugratejasvī krośamātru svaru tasya gacchatī /
S04bsu022_u:4076: no ca kaści śṛṇute purottame devatābhi osvāpanaṃ kṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:4077: Lal_15.148 svarṇarūpyamaṇikoṭitā mahī kaṇṭhakasya caraṇaiḥ parāhatā /
S04bsu022_u:4078: sā raṇī madhurabhīṣmaśobhanā no ca keci śṛṇuvanti mānuṣāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4079: Lal_15.149 puṣyayuktu abhu tasmi antare candrajyotiṣa nabhe pratisthitā /
S04bsu022_u:4083: Lal_15.151 so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato āruhī kumudavarṣikopamam /
S04bsu022_u:4084: ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī prakampitā buddhakṣetra sphuṭa ābhanirmalā //
S04bsu022_u:4085: Lal_15.152 śakra devaguruḥ śacīpatiḥ svāma dvāra vivarī tadantare /
S04bsu022_u:4087: Lal_15.153 saṃjñamātra iha jāti kaṇṭhako lokanāthu vahatī nabho 'ntare /
S04bsu022_u:4089: devadānavagaṇā saindrikāḥ ye vahanti sugatasya gacchataḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4091: kaṇṭhakasya balu te dadantikāḥ muñci ghoṣu madhuraṃ manoramam //
S04bsu022_u:4092: Lal_15.155 kaṇṭhakā vahahi lokanāyakaṃ śīghra śīghra ma janehi khedatām /
S04bsu022_u:4094: Lal_15.156 ekameka abhinandate suro vāhanaṃ smi ahu lokanāyake /
S04bsu022_u:4095: no ca kiṃcidapi deśu vidyate devakoṭicaraṇairna marditam //
S04bsu022_u:4096: Lal_15.157 paśya kaṇṭhaka nabhontare imaṃ mārgu saṃsthitu vicitraśobhanam /
S04bsu022_u:4098: Lal_15.158 ena kaṇṭhaka śubhena karmaṇā trāyatriṃśabhavane sunirmito /
S04bsu022_u:4100: Lal_15.159 sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī tuṣṭa bhohi paramapraharṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:4102: Lal_15.160 ye narāḥ sukṛtakarmakārakāḥ te na gopi sada roditavyakāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4103: so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato harṣitavya na sa roditavyakaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4104: Lal_15.161 [Vaidya_173]saptarātra bhaṇabhānu gopike sā viyūha napi śakya kṣepitum /
S04bsu022_u:4105: yā viyūha abhu tatra pārthive niṣkramanti naradevapūjite //
S04bsu022_u:4106: Lal_15.162 lābha tubhya paramā acintiyā yaṃ tyupasthitu jage hitaṃkaro /
S04bsu022_u:4107: mahya saṃjñi svakameva vartate tvaṃ hi bheṣyasi yathā narottamaḥ // iti //
S04bsu022_u:4113: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt //
S04bsu022_u:4114_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya
S04bsu022_u:4114_1: sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai
S04bsu022_u:4115: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4116: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4117: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4122: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto 'bhut //
S04bsu022_u:4123: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4124: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4125: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma - paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:4128: tato 'haṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat - careyamahaṃ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam /
S04bsu022_u:4129: so 'vocat - cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro 'lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati //
S04bsu022_u:4130: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - asti me chando 'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā,
S04bsu022_u:4131: yannvahameko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai //
S04bsu022_u:4132: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam //
S04bsu022_u:4133: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat - etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo 'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4135: tamahamavocat - mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'dhigataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4136: so 'vocat - tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
S04bsu022_u:4141: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4142: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4144: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,
S04bsu022_u:4147: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4148: so 'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūvam /
S04bsu022_u:4150_0: tato 'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ
S04bsu022_u:4150_1: piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena
S04bsu022_u:4151: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan - kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam //
S04bsu022_u:4153: Lal_16.1 atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4155: Lal_16.2 rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṃ nivāsayitvā /
S04bsu022_u:4156: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṃ sapiṇḍapātram //
S04bsu022_u:4157: Lal_16.3 kanakamiva sudhātujātarūpaṃ kavacitu lakṣaṇatriṃśatā dvibhiśca /
S04bsu022_u:4158: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena //
S04bsu022_u:4159: Lal_16.4 vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato 'sya /
S04bsu022_u:4160: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṃ vibhāti sarvam //
S04bsu022_u:4161: Lal_16.5 upari sthihiya nāriṇāṃ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne /
S04bsu022_u:4163: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4164: Lal_16.6 na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṃ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam /
S04bsu022_u:4165: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam //
S04bsu022_u:4166: Lal_16.7 puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṃ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo /
S04bsu022_u:4167: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4168: Lal_16.8 keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4169: tatha api saṃtuṣitaṃ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4170: Lal_16.9 keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī /
S04bsu022_u:4171: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṃ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī //
S04bsu022_u:4172: Lal_16.10 vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo 'sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe /
S04bsu022_u:4173: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṃ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṃ vā //
S04bsu022_u:4174: Lal_16.11 piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī /
S04bsu022_u:4175: dṛṣṭva girivaraṃ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam //
S04bsu022_u:4176: Lal_16.12 rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4177: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam //
S04bsu022_u:4178: Lal_16.13 [Vaidya_177]dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4179: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena //
S04bsu022_u:4180: Lal_16.14 śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṃ samudāharitva vocat /
S04bsu022_u:4181: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṃ ca piṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4182: Lal_16.15 prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva /
S04bsu022_u:4183: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṃ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4185: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṃghaṃ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4186: Lal_16.17 paramapramudito 'smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:4187: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṃ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4188: Lal_16.18 mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam /
S04bsu022_u:4189: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:4190: Lal_16.19 prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī /
S04bsu022_u:4191: svasti dharaṇipāla te 'stu nityaṃ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko 'smi //
S04bsu022_u:4192: Lal_16.20 kāma viṣasamā anantadoṣā narakaprapātana pretatiryagyonau /
S04bsu022_u:4193: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam //
S04bsu022_u:4194: Lal_16.21 [Vaidya_178]kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti /
S04bsu022_u:4195: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṃ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā //
S04bsu022_u:4196: Lal_16.22 kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī /
S04bsu022_u:4197: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4198: Lal_16.23 kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā /
S04bsu022_u:4199: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṃ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan //
S04bsu022_u:4200: Lal_16.24 ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṃjñā /
S04bsu022_u:4201: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4202: Lal_16.25 kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṃskṛtasya /
S04bsu022_u:4203: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne //
S04bsu022_u:4204: Lal_16.26 api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṃ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat /
S04bsu022_u:4205: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṃ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4206: Lal_16.27 ahamapi vipulāṃ vijahya kāmāṃ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:4207: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato 'haṃ paramaśivāṃ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4209: Lal_16.28 katama diśi kuto gato 'si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā /
S04bsu022_u:4211: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo 'tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṃjñā //
S04bsu022_u:4213: Lal_16.29 śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṃ kapilapuraṃ paramaṃ suṛddhisphītam /
S04bsu022_u:4214: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī //
S04bsu022_u:4216: Lal_16.30 sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṃ te yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4217: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo //
S04bsu022_u:4218: Lal_16.31 yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim /
S04bsu022_u:4219: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṃbho //
S04bsu022_u:4220: Lal_16.32 punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā /
S04bsu022_u:4222: Lal_16.33 magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam /
S04bsu022_u:4223: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṃ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4229: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4230: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4231: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam /
S04bsu022_u:4232: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto 'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4234: naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4235: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4236: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:4237: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti //
S04bsu022_u:4238: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4239: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputrametadavocat - kaste mārṣa śāstā, kasya vā dharmaṃ deśitamājānāsi?
S04bsu022_u:4240: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha - na me mārṣa kaścicchāstā /
S04bsu022_u:4241: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4242: bodhisattva āha - kiṃ bhavatādhigatam? āha - naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4243: bodhisattva āha - labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam?
S04bsu022_u:4246: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4247_0: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa
S04bsu022_u:4247_1: ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi
S04bsu022_u:4247_2: samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
S04bsu022_u:4248: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:4249: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:4251: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4252: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:4253: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo 'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4254: so 'vocat - tena hyāgaccha, tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
S04bsu022_u:4255: samānārthe ca bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_181] sthāpayati sma ācāryasthāne ca /
S04bsu022_u:4256: bodhisattva āha - naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate //
S04bsu022_u:4257: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti //
S04bsu022_u:4258: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4259: teṣāmetadabhūt - yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
S04bsu022_u:4260: na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
S04bsu022_u:4266: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan //
S04bsu022_u:4267: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4268: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:4269: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4270: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4271: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
S04bsu022_u:4272: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4273: katamāstisraḥ? ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4275: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā, sāpyanupaśāntā /
S04bsu022_u:4276: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4277: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4278: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4280: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4281: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4282: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4284: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4286: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4287: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti /
S04bsu022_u:4288: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4290: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4291: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4292: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:4296: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:4297: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4298: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4299: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:4301: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
S04bsu022_u:4302: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:4303: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca //
S04bsu022_u:4304: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca /
S04bsu022_u:4305: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:4306: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
S04bsu022_u:4308: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4309: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
S04bsu022_u:4310: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano 'tīva prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4314_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - pañcakaṣāyakāle 'hamiha jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo
S04bsu022_u:4330: evaṃvidhāni ime tīrthyāḥ kurvante, āśrayante ca saṃsārabhayabhītāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4331_0: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā
S04bsu022_u:4331_2: tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4333: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti //
S04bsu022_u:4334: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4335: kena kāraṇenocyate duṣkaracaryeti? duṣkarakārikaiṣā, tenocyate duṣkaracaryeti /
S04bsu022_u:4336: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
S04bsu022_u:4341: sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
S04bsu022_u:4342: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam /
S04bsu022_u:4343: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena [Vaidya_184] vā caryāpratipannena vā bodhisattvena /
S04bsu022_u:4345: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:4347_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:4347_1: parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4348: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma, niṣpīḍayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4349: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4351: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4352: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
S04bsu022_u:4353: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4355: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4356: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:4357: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām /
S04bsu022_u:4359: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
S04bsu022_u:4360: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4361: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4364: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
S04bsu022_u:4365: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma //
S04bsu022_u:4366: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4370: Lal_17.1 mā khalvayaṃ śākyanarendragarbho hyapūrṇasaṃkalpa ihaiva raṇye /
S04bsu022_u:4371: kṛtvā trilokaṃ dukhitaṃ hyanāthaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyatyakṛtārtha eva //
S04bsu022_u:4372: Lal_17.2 hā sattvasārā sadṛḍhapratijñā saddharmayajñena nimantritābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:4374: vayaṃ purā te tuṣiteṣu nāthā kva sā pratijñā tava śuddhasattva //
S04bsu022_u:4375: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti - kālagataḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4376: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu022_u:4380: Lal_17.3 yadā jāto 'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye /
S04bsu022_u:4382: Lal_17.4 diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā /
S04bsu022_u:4383: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā //
S04bsu022_u:4385: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā //
S04bsu022_u:4386: Lal_17.6 cakravartiśriyaṃ putra napi bhuktā manoramā /
S04bsu022_u:4387: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto 'si nidhanaṃ vane //
S04bsu022_u:4388: Lal_17.7 putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā /
S04bsu022_u:4391: Lal_17.8 kaiṣā ati tvāṃ karuṇaṃ rudāsi prakīrṇakeśā vinivṛttaśobhā /
S04bsu022_u:4394: Lal_17.9 mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4395: sā te 'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā //
S04bsu022_u:4396: atha bodhisattva āśvāsayannuvāca - na bhetavyaṃ putralālase, śramaṃ te saphalaṃ kariṣyasi /
S04bsu022_u:4400: Lal_17.10 api śatadhā vasudhā vikīryeta meruḥ plave cāmbhasi ratnaśṛṅgaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4401: candrārkatārāgaṇa bhū pateta pṛthajano naiva ahaṃ mriyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:4403: yasmānna śoko tvayi atra kāryo na vai cirād drakṣyasi buddhabodhim //
S04bsu022_u:4404: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma //
S04bsu022_u:4405: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:4408: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ - mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi /
S04bsu022_u:4411: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato 'dvitīyaṃ kāyo 'tyarthaṃ karśito 'bhūddurbalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4412: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā, evameva me 'ṅgapratyaṅgānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4413: tadyathāpi nāma karkaṭapārśukā, evameva me pārśukā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4414: tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
S04bsu022_u:4415: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma /
S04bsu022_u:4416: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā,
S04bsu022_u:4418: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam /
S04bsu022_u:4419: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:4421: evameva me 'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma /
S04bsu022_u:4422: tadyathāpi nāmājapadaṃ voṣṭrapadaṃ vā, evameva me kakṣākukṣivakṣādīnyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:4423: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam /
S04bsu022_u:4425: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito 'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi kāyācchīryante sma /
S04bsu022_u:4426: yāpi me 'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4427: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4431: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4433: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle 'bhūditi /
S04bsu022_u:4436: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo 'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti /
S04bsu022_u:4439: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:4443: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye 'nāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:4446: tasya me bhikṣavo 'nāhārasya kāyo 'tīva śuṣko 'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4447: tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā /
S04bsu022_u:4449: tadyathā karkaṭakapārśukā vāhanaśālāyāṃ vā gopānasī (pārśve) dviparivartanā veṇīvatpṛṣṭhīkaṇṭakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4452: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta /
S04bsu022_u:4455: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:4459: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:4460_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:4460_1: sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca
S04bsu022_u:4461: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena /
S04bsu022_u:4464: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:4473: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:4478: yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:4483: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:4484: te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā bodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:4486: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan //
S04bsu022_u:4488: Lal_17.11 tasya ca guṇānvitasya purādviniṣkramya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:4498: Lal_17.16 na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya /
S04bsu022_u:4503: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:4504: Lal_17.19 dhārenti ūrdhvahastā urdhvaṃkeśā jaṭāśca dhārenti /
S04bsu022_u:4508: Lal_17.21 utsāṃ sarasataḍāgāṃ sāgarasaritaśca candrasūryau ca /
S04bsu022_u:4512: Lal_17.23 yannūnamahaṃ vratatapa duṣkaracaryāṃ samārabhe ghorām /
S04bsu022_u:4513: yaṃ duṣkaraṃ na śakyaṃ carituṃ devairmanuṣyairvā //
S04bsu022_u:4514: Lal_17.24 āsphānakaṃ ca dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyaṃ vajrakalpadṛḍhasthānam /
S04bsu022_u:4515: yaṃ dhyānaṃ na samarthāḥ pratyekajināpi darśayitum //
S04bsu022_u:4516: Lal_17.25 santīha devamanujāḥ tīrthika lūhavratena hṛṣyante /
S04bsu022_u:4520: Lal_17.27 āśvāsaviprahīnaḥ praśvāsavarjitu na ceñjate bālavān /
S04bsu022_u:4522: Lal_17.28 kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram /
S04bsu022_u:4524: Lal_17.29 na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau /
S04bsu022_u:4526: Lal_17.30 na ca vātavṛṣṭichadanaṃ na daṃśamaśakāsarīsṛpātrāṇam /
S04bsu022_u:4528: Lal_17.31 na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:4531: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti //
S04bsu022_u:4532: Lal_17.33 aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti /
S04bsu022_u:4533: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam //
S04bsu022_u:4534: Lal_17.34 na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati /
S04bsu022_u:4535: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī //
S04bsu022_u:4537: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī //
S04bsu022_u:4540: Lal_17.37 praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram /
S04bsu022_u:4542: Lal_17.38 na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā /
S04bsu022_u:4544: Lal_17.39 nihatāḥ parapravādā dhyāmīkṛta tīrthikā mativihīnāḥ /
